items.title: The Symbolism Behind India’s ‘Operation Sindoor’
items.description: The name for the military attack on Pakistan brings to mind a woman who became shorthand for the grief wrought by a terrorist attack.

items.title: Salt Lake City and Boise Adopt Official Pride Flags in Response to State Laws
items.description: The cities approved several new flags after Utah and Idaho passed laws barring unofficial flags from being displayed on government property.

items.title: A Conclave Primer
items.description: We look at how the Catholic Church will select Pope Francis’ successor.
